definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

sentences.english: Bishamber had now come back to Calcutta, and had at once made enquiries about his sister.
sentences.chinese: 比山博现在来了加尔各答，当即询问关于妹妹的境况。

sentences.english: The Club also maintains a Lawn Bowls Pavalion in the Kolkata Maidan.
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部在加尔各答马坦公园海有一个草地保龄球场。

sentences.english: Passengers stand on a platform at a metro station in Kolkata.
sentences.chinese: 加尔各答一座地铁站站台上，乘客们正在候车。

sentences.english: A city of northeast India on the Hooghly River north of Calcutta.
sentences.chinese: 印度东北部一城市，位于加尔各答以北的胡格利河畔。

sentences.english: She is part of the chromosome of Kolkata.
sentences.chinese: 她就是加尔各答染色体的一部分。

sentences.english: Another day I had gone to the Maidan in Calcutta for fresh air.
sentences.chinese: 另一天，我走到加尔各答的操场去呼吸新鲜空气。

sentences.english: IPC income from West India (2) now goes to Calcutta.
sentences.chinese: 西印度的2点收入归加尔各答。

sentences.english: You cannot imagine Kolkata without Mother Teresa.
sentences.chinese: 你无法想象失去了特蕾莎嬷嬷的加尔各答。

sentences.english: Mumbai and Calcutta are already very poor about providing land and housing.
sentences.chinese: 孟买和加尔各答现在已经没有空闲的土地和住房了。

sentences.english: He lived with his father in Calcutta and now and then visited the Master at Dakshineswar.
sentences.chinese: 他与父亲住在加尔各答，偶尔到达克希什瓦拜访师父。
霍乱是加尔各答的流行病。

definition: Delhi/New Delhi, capital of India/same as 新德里[Xin1 De2 li3]
Bangalore, capital of southwest Indian state Karnataka 卡納塔克邦|卡纳塔克邦[Ka3 na4 ta3 ke4 bang1]
Yangon (Rangoon), city, capital of Myanmar from 1948 to 2006
Chennai, capital of southeast Indian state Tamil Nadu 泰米爾納德邦|泰米尔纳德邦[Tai4 mi3 er3 Na4 de2 bang1]/formerly called Madras 馬德拉斯|马德拉斯[Ma3 de2 la1 si1]
Calicut, town on Arabian sea in Kerala, India
Madras or Chennai 欽奈|钦奈[Qin1 nai4], capital of Tamil Nadu on East coast of India
